title: Pixel 4 XL Stuck on G logo loading page after Google Android Pixel Security Update - Nov 2019
content:
After selecting to update my google pixel 4 XL with the Google Android Pixel Security Update - Nov 2019 the system got stuck on G logo loading page for the last 3 hours.

I need my mobile to contact family members and notify of important updates and this thing simple crashed.

I had more than 95% of battery when I decided to update.
